# Test Skill 1

This is a test skill for validating standard skills directory discovery.

## Purpose

Used in unit tests to verify that the discovery system can:
- Find skills in the standard `skills/` directory
- Parse skill metadata correctly
- Validate skill name matches directory name

## Usage

This skill is part of the test fixtures and is not meant for production use.
